website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a well-made indoor fryer and don't need a larger unit, it's worth considering despite its limitations.
pros: A well-made fryer that sports a patented drain clip and oil drain that makes changing the oil easy
Earns praise for tender, juicy results
cons: Takes a while to heat oil to proper cooking temperature
Not for large turkeys – only fits up to 14 lbs

customer_reviews.title: Cancer Warning
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that it does not tell you of the cancer warning before purchase. I order this in July, opened tomuse it at my sister’s in Cincinnati and once we saw the cancer warning we decided not to use it. What can you do concerning this matter, I feel like my money has been wasted. What exactly is the reason for the cancer warning, is there lead involved?
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle

customer_reviews.title: Best Turkey Ever !
customer_reviews.text: This product is so well engineered, it would be hard to have a bad outcome with respect to the food and one's own safety. I fried two large turkey breasts in about 2 hours. The night before I had injected the meat with a marinade. Meat was moist and delicious. It did take 2 gallons of peanut oil to cover the meat, but the Turkey couldn't have absorbed much of that, since the residual after cooking was nearly 2 gallons. Clean up was a breeze. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: ringlady

customer_reviews.title: Made for Indoor Use
customer_reviews.text: For those who expect to take this outside and deep fry a turkey in cold weather it doesn't work well that way. The stubby power cord proves it's made for countertop use just like a slow cooker. But who wants to risk heating that volume of oil indoors. If you use it outside and it's cold, it takes forever to get a turkey fully cooked as was my experience. Buy a larger one made for outdoor use unless you want to fry whole chickens in it which I did. It worked fine with the much smaller bird.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy T.

customer_reviews.title: works great, when it works
customer_reviews.text: unit cooks well, easy to clean however. biggest problem is i have to reset it constantly to get it heat to the proper temperature, even then it's hit or miss if it will work properly. sometimes it will heat all the way up then other times it wont. if i set it to say 275 it will begin to heat, but if i turn it past that the unit will just turn off, so i have to reset it. at first i thought it was because of amperage draw, but i plugged it into an isolated 20amp circuit and still the same issue can not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Moon

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer specifically to fry my homemade Filipino lumpia. I fry 25 at a time and it works phenomenally. At first I was terrified, but now I am a pro and it works just great. My only complaint is that there's too many dips in the top where the lid gets set down, so oil can build up in there. Other than that, this product is amazing. I can't wait to fry my turkey in here so I have room in my oven for everything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cooks in no time.. but I gotta brine the turkey next time.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Absolutely no complaints as this product is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Absolutely no complaints as this product is superbly designed. Setup is easy and cleanup is pain free. I would highly recommend to anyone that is looking to jump into the deep fried turkey arena or if you are looking to replace a propane fryer. Figure about an one hour and a half for setup, cooking (depending of size of turkey) and cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dillion

customer_reviews.title: Fries Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son in law to deep fry his turkey. He loved it.. Heavy with the grease in it and you have to be very careful as with any kind of deep fryer.. Cleaned up easy and stored easy as well....I'd buy another one.. price was reasonable...
customer_reviews.author: kathleen j gyuran

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey we ever made!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for thanksgiving. Our turkay was moist, cook time was just over an hour. Freed up the oven and used very little oil. We got all the oil back but 1/2 a cup!!! Love this and would buy again! The turkey tastes great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Downing

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond impressed! We used this to make our Thanksgiving turkey and it ended up being the juiciest turkey we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jonteé M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to make a moist and tender turkey Fast! A 12-14# turkey in 45 minutes is awesome and don't worry about burning the house down! I cook in my work room to keep the house from smelling, but it's fine when burning a scented candle! (Don't BURN the house down! lol )
customer_reviews.author: Larry Medama

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the outdoor propane turkey fryer I had. One of my favorite unexpected features is that it uses a lot less oil then the outdoor propane fryer Ive used for years. This is much easier to use and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Better than propane fryer. Not dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer works great. Cooked two 15 lb turkeys for thanksgiving. Oil took about 30 minutes to get up to temperature. Once I dropped the turkey in, it cooked perfect. The oil line is a little low. Probably should put a little extra oil in the pan. Both my turkeys were not submerged in oil. They still cooked fine. Easy to drain oil and clean up. I like better than traditional propane fryer.
customer_reviews.author: christopher Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, practical for big family (5) or more, or a get together, snacks, main dish.... possibilities are endless very satisfied customer and is for indoors a whole turkey frying indoors 👀 wow....
customer_reviews.author: rubys

customer_reviews.title: when used with pure olive oil gives a very delicious fried taste better then fast food places
customer_reviews.text: only used 3 times so far for frying a 15 lb turkey, 2 young game hens, and a beef roast . when used with pure olive oil gives a very delicious fried taste better then fast food places. It fried fast at 50% less time it would take to use the oven at least for the turkey. Its been easy to clean . No problems with it. Would recommend it to anyone who likes to eat healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Infante

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item as a gift. I have not used this, therefore, I cannot provide an objective review.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This amazing fryer is the perfect machine for deep fried turkey and i'm sure for many other meals. A+
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Deep fried 6 turkey breast with the new fryer. This was my second Butterball Fryer and would buy again. By the way, my first one went out due to users error. Always have fluid, oil or water, in cooker before heating up coils, my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fryer
customer_reviews.text: For thanksgiving, this fryer was amazingly easy to use. I will never bake a turkey again, frying was so much easier, tastier, and faster! Well worth the small price they ask you pay to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michl Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Butterball deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. Made a deep fried turkey for the holidays and it was perfect and easy
customer_reviews.author: michael k harlan

customer_reviews.title: Really simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the easiest way to cook a turkey. Frees up the oven so you can cook other foods at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen investment in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen investment in a long time. Love this product. cuts down prep-time for meals and can use inside.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Vey happy with the capacity
customer_reviews.text: Vey happy with the capacity. Two gallons of oil makes it easy to fry in one batch enough chicken, fish, etc. to feed 4-5 without a big drop in oil temperature.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job deep frying a turkey and chicken wings
customer_reviews.author: Ron McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Use everyday I know that’s bad lol don’t judge me but I love my fried foods haha no complaints what so ever everything works like it is supposed to and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Kien

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn’t know it would be so big but great mother’s day gifr
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my intended use. Deep frying cornish hens.
customer_reviews.author: kwang Yi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This a great deep fryer. I use it for wings and chicken strips and they come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: timothy d nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job with my first every turkey at home!
customer_reviews.author: Casual2u

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad I had this for Thanksgiving. Much easier to clean than older fryer I had.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. The quality of unit is obvious when unboxed. Best part is the ease of clean up. Spout for grease removal. Removable oil basin. Very happy with both product and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to deep fry my turkey for Thanksgiving. It was so simple to make, the results were delicious and clean up was so easy. But we also used it to do a seafood boil on Saturday and that was super easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Butterball fryer.purchase one for my sister she loves her to.
customer_reviews.author: Debra T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my parents. Easy to use and everything tastes amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect turkey
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fried turkey. My son loves it! Safe and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eradio

customer_reviews.title: Love this fryer
customer_reviews.text: Love this fryer. Used it for Thanksgiving and my turkey was perfect, the inside was moist and the skin was not over cooked. Only regret is that I didn’t purchase the larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good unit but doesn't recover heat very quickly. Small batch frying is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Monteverde

customer_reviews.title: All my turkeys came out great.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to get back up to temperature after adding the turkey, but no worry of over heating or burning the oil. All my turkeys came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: The electric fryer is an excellent machine. It works great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Drew M.

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy the right size turkey.
customer_reviews.text: The turkey was cooked to perfection. No greasy splatter. Easy to clean. Able to fry turkey on countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Short Power Cord
customer_reviews.text: Power cord is really short for safety, other than that work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z

customer_reviews.title: I love this fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this fryer! Cooks perfect chicken. I cooked 40 lbs of the wing sections for hot wings on 2 gallons of oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The top of the turkey never seems to be fully submerged
customer_reviews.text: I had the original Master Built indoor electric frier for 10 years. I loved it but it's time had come because I used it a lot. I thought the newer model would be better but it's not as good. Still good but a little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fryer did not come on. Since it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The fryer did not come on. Since it was my responsibility to bring the turkey we did not have any turkey on Thanksgiving.There was not enough time to cook it another way.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm3

customer_reviews.title: Where is the instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving one star because I just got the item today. I’m taking nit out of the box now and despite the info in then box which said in all caps read instruction manual before use but there is no manual included. I’m hoping it is foolproof and I don’t burn my house down because I don’t have an instruction manual to follow. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

product_meta.title: Butterball MB23010118 Electric Fryer, Large
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:PlatinumFry, steam or boil your favorite foods with the Butterball Electric Fryer by Masterbuilt. The fryer uses 30% less oil than traditional fryers and is designed and tested to commercial standards. The extra-large basket accommodates up to a 14 lb. turkey, 3 lbs. of chicken wings or a large seafood boil. Cleanup is easy with the built-in drain valve and dishwasher safe components.
feature_bullets: Chrome-coated wire basket with patented drain clips
Oil drain valve for easy clean-up
Dishwasher safe components (pot, basket, lid, drain valve)
Designed and tested to meet commercial standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars108 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
